resources.string: USSD response text will be placed here...
Seems like there was an error, please try again...
To start using USSD Wear please turn on our USSD reader service in Accessibility settings
You are almost done! To start using USSD Wear setup your USSD request number and test it with \"Check USSD\" button on next screen. Then you\'ll be ready to call USSD from your wearable device!

USSD Wear v1.0
Developed by Alexander Golikov, 2014
Launcher icon modified from source made by Freepik (http://www.freepik.com) from http://www.flaticon.com
Licensed under CC BY 3.0
This service helps USSD Wear parse USSD requests and pass results to your wearable device.
